dialogue.quote: This is Test Quote #2! Together now!
This is Test Quote #3! Part 1 that is!
This is Test Quote #3! Part 2, now isnt that great?
This is test quote #4! All at once!
This is Test Quote #5! 3 part back and forth!
Why would we talk back and forth?
To tell if when blocked it keeps who is who for guessing!
